bugs.title: Login button not responsive
bugs.description: The login button does not register clicks on mobile devices.

bugs.title: Page not found error
bugs.description: The About Us page returns a 404 error when accessed via the navigation bar.

bugs.title: API response timeout
bugs.description: The fetch request for user data times out after 5 seconds.

bugs.title: Broken image link on homepage
bugs.description: The hero image on the homepage fails to load due to an incorrect URL.

bugs.title: Error message not displayed
bugs.description: The application does not show an error message when the server returns a 500 status.

bugs.title: Form validation not working
bugs.description: The email field allows invalid email addresses to be submitted.

bugs.title: Slow loading time on dashboard
bugs.description: Dashboard takes more than 10 seconds to load for users with large datasets.

bugs.title: Logout functionality broken
bugs.description: The logout button does not clear the session and redirect the user.

bugs.title: Search bar UI glitch
bugs.description: The search bar overlaps with the navigation menu on smaller screens.

bugs.title: Missing translations
bugs.description: Some buttons and labels are not translated in the French version of the app.

bugs.title: Crash on submitting large files
bugs.description: Uploading files larger than 10MB causes the application to crash.

bugs.title: Profile picture upload fails
bugs.description: Users cannot upload profile pictures due to server validation errors.

bugs.title: Dark mode toggle not working
bugs.description: The dark mode setting is not preserved after refreshing the page.

bugs.title: Pagination not functioning
bugs.description: Clicking next on the pagination component does not load the next set of results.

bugs.title: Incorrect total in cart
bugs.description: The total price in the shopping cart does not include discounts.

bugs.title: Notification bell unresponsive
bugs.description: The notification bell icon does not open the notifications panel.

bugs.title: Session expiration issues
bugs.description: Sessions do not expire after the set timeout period.

bugs.title: Broken footer links
bugs.description: Links in the footer lead to incorrect or outdated pages.

bugs.title: Sorting feature not working
bugs.description: The sort by price feature does not rearrange items correctly.

bugs.title: Keyboard navigation issue
bugs.description: Keyboard navigation skips over some interactive elements.
